Token.Abstract: The C4MethodDelay protocol defines two methods that can be used to trigger other methods after a specified amount of time.
Sends a specified message to the receiver after a specified amount of time.

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method to run

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The amount of time to wait, in seconds, before running the specified method

Token.Abstract:
Sends a message to the receiver with an object as the argument after a specific amount of time.
This method wraps -(void)performSelector:(SEL)aSelector withObject:(id)object from the NSObject Protocol Reference

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the method to run

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object that is the sole argument of the message.

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The amount of time to wait, in seconds, before running the specified method
